verses.verse: Now <WG1161> Peter <WG4074> and <WG2532> John <WG2491> went up <WG305> together <WG1909> <WG846> into <WG1519> the temple <WG2411> at the hour <WG5610> of prayer <WG4335>, being the ninth <WG1766> hour.

Who <WG3739> seeing <WG1492> Peter <WG4074> and <WG2532> John <WG2491> about <WG3195> to go <WG1524> into <WG1519> the temple <WG2411> asked <WG2065> <WG2983> an alms <WG1654>.
And <WG1161> Peter <WG4074>, fastening his eyes <WG816> upon <WG1519> him <WG846> with <WG4862> John <WG2491>, said <WG2036>, Look <WG991> on <WG1519> us <WG2248>.
And <WG1161> he gave heed <WG1907> unto them <WG846>, expecting <WG4328> to receive <WG2983> something <WG5100> of <WG3844> them <WG846>.

Then <WG1161> Peter <WG4074> said <WG2036>, Silver <WG694> and <WG2532> gold <WG5553> have <WG5225> I <WG3427> none <WG3756>; but <WG1161> such as <WG3739> <WG5124> I have <WG2192> give I <WG1325> thee <WG4671>: In <WG1722> the name <WG3686> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> of Nazareth <WG3480> rise up <WG1453> and <WG2532> walk <WG4043>.

And <WG2532> he took <WG4084> him <WG846> by the right <WG1188> hand <WG5495>, and lifted him up <WG1453>: and <WG1161> immediately <WG3916> his <WG846> feet <WG939> and <WG2532> ancle bones <WG4974> received strength <WG4732>.

And <WG2532> he leaping up <WG1814> stood <WG2476>, and <WG2532> walked <WG4043>, and <WG2532> entered <WG1525> with <WG4862> them <WG846> into <WG1519> the temple <WG2411>, walking <WG4043>, and <WG2532> leaping <WG242>, and <WG2532> praising <WG134> God <WG2316>.
And <WG2532> all <WG3956> the people <WG2992> saw <WG1492> him <WG846> walking <WG4043> and <WG2532> praising <WG134> God <WG2316>:

And <WG5037> they knew <WG1921> that <WG3754> it <WG846> was <WG2258> he <WG3778> which <WG3588> sat <WG2521> for <WG4314> alms <WG1654> at <WG1909> the Beautiful <WG5611> gate <WG4439> of the temple <WG2411>: and <WG2532> they were filled <WG4130> with wonder <WG2285> and <WG2532> amazement <WG1611> at <WG1909> that which had happened <WG4819> unto him <WG846>.

And <WG1161> as the lame man <WG5560> which was healed <WG2390> held <WG2902> Peter <WG4074> and <WG2532> John <WG2491>, all <WG3956> the people <WG2992> ran together <WG4936> unto <WG4314> them <WG846> in <WG1909> the porch <WG4745> that is called <WG2564> Solomon's <WG4672>, greatly wondering <WG1569>.

¶ And <WG1161> when Peter <WG4074> saw <WG1492> it, he answered <WG611> unto <WG4314> the people <WG2992>, Ye men <WG435> of Israel <WG2475>, why <WG5101> marvel ye <WG2296> at <WG1909> this <WG5129>? or <WG2228> why <WG5101> look ye so earnestly <WG816> on us <WG2254>, as though <WG5613> by our own <WG2398> power <WG1411> or <WG2228> holiness <WG2150> we had made <WG4160> this man <WG846> to walk <WG4043>?

The God <WG2316> of Abraham <WG11>, and <WG2532> of Isaac <WG2464>, and <WG2532> of Jacob <WG2384>, the God <WG2316> of our <WG2257> fathers <WG3962>, hath glorified <WG1392> his <WG846> Son <WG3816> Jesus <WG2424>; whom <WG3739> ye <WG5210> delivered up <WG3860>, and <WG2532> denied <WG720> him <WG846> in <WG2596> the presence <WG4383> of Pilate <WG4091>, when he was determined <WG2919> to let <WG630> him <WG1565> go <WG630>.
But <WG1161> ye <WG5210> denied <WG720> the Holy One <WG40> and <WG2532> the Just <WG1342>, and <WG2532> desired <WG154> a murderer <WG5406> <WG435> to be granted <WG5483> unto you <WG5213>;

And <WG1161> killed <WG615> the Prince <WG747> of life <WG2222>, whom <WG3739> God <WG2316> hath raised <WG1453> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498>; whereof <WG3739> we <WG2249> are <WG2070> witnesses <WG3144>.

And <WG2532> his <WG846> name <WG3686> through <WG1909> faith <WG4102> in his <WG846> name <WG3686> hath made <WG4732> this man <WG5026> strong <WG4732>, whom <WG3739> ye see <WG2334> and <WG2532> know <WG1492>: yea <WG2532>, the faith <WG4102> which is <WG1325> by <WG1223> him <WG846> hath given <WG1325> him <WG846> this <WG5126> perfect soundness <WG3647> in the presence <WG561> of you <WG5216> all <WG3956>.
And <WG2532> now <WG3568>, brethren <WG80>, I wot <WG1492> that <WG3754> through <WG2596> ignorance <WG52> ye did <WG4238> it, as <WG5618> did also <WG2532> your <WG5216> rulers <WG758>.

But <WG1161> those things, which <WG3739> God <WG2316> before had shewed <WG4293> by <WG1223> the mouth <WG4750> of all <WG3956> his <WG846> prophets <WG4396>, that Christ <WG5547> should suffer <WG3958>, he hath <WG4137> so <WG3779> fulfilled <WG4137>.

¶ Repent ye <WG3340> therefore <WG3767>, and <WG2532> be converted <WG1994>, that <WG1519> your <WG5216> sins <WG266> may be blotted out <WG1813>, when <WG3704> the times <WG2540> of refreshing <WG403> shall come <WG302> <WG2064> from <WG575> the presence <WG4383> of the Lord <WG2962>;
And <WG2532> he shall send <WG649> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, which before was preached <WG4296> unto you <WG5213>:

Whom <WG3739> the heaven <WG3772> <WG3303> must <WG1163> receive <WG1209> until <WG891> the times <WG5550> of restitution <WG605> of all things <WG3956>, which <WG3739> God <WG2316> hath spoken <WG2980> by <WG1223> the mouth <WG4750> of all <WG3956> his <WG846> holy <WG40> prophets <WG4396> since <WG575> the world began <WG165>.

For <WG1063> Moses <WG3475> truly <WG3303> said <WG2036> unto <WG4314> the fathers <WG3962> <WG3754>, A prophet <WG4396> shall <WG450> the Lord <WG2962> your <WG5216> God <WG2316> raise up <WG450> unto you <WG5213> of <WG1537> your <WG5216> brethren <WG80>, like <WG5613> unto me <WG1691>; him <WG846> shall ye hear <WG191> in <WG2596> all things <WG3956> whatsoever <WG3745> <WG302> he shall say <WG2980> unto <WG4314> you <WG5209>.

And <WG1161> it shall come to pass <WG2071>, that every <WG3956> soul <WG5590>, which <WG3748> <WG302> will <WG191> not <WG3361> hear <WG191> that <WG1565> prophet <WG4396>, shall be destroyed <WG1842> from among <WG1537> the people <WG2992>.

Yea <WG2532>, and <WG1161> all <WG3956> the prophets <WG4396> from <WG575> Samuel <WG4545> and <WG2532> those that follow after <WG2517>, as many as <WG3745> have spoken <WG2980>, have <WG4293> likewise <WG2532> foretold <WG4293> of these <WG5025> days <WG2250>.

Ye <WG5210> are <WG2075> the children <WG5207> of the prophets <WG4396>, and <WG2532> of the covenant <WG1242> which <WG3739> God <WG2316> made <WG1303> with <WG4314> our <WG2257> fathers <WG3962>, saying <WG3004> unto <WG4314> Abraham <WG11>, And <WG2532> in thy <WG4675> seed <WG4690> shall <WG1757> all <WG3956> the kindreds <WG3965> of the earth <WG1093> be blessed <WG1757>.

Unto you <WG5213> first <WG4412> God <WG2316>, having raised up <WG450> his <WG846> Son <WG3816> Jesus <WG2424>, sent <WG649> him <WG846> to bless <WG2127> you <WG5209>, in <WG1722> turning away <WG654> every one <WG1538> of you <WG5216> from <WG575> his iniquities <WG4189>.
